whatsNewHTML:
What's New

3.4.1.8
Thank you for using AccuWeather.
• Design improvements for AccuWeather MinuteCast® – the only global minute-by-minute precipitation forecast for a person’s exact street address or GPS location.
• Bug fixes to enhance your overall AccuWeather app experience.
* Please re-add widgets if widgets disappear after update. We have added a new widget "AccuWeather Now" that supports MinuteCast
As always, contact support@accuweather.com with any questions or concerns. We are here to help.
description: Stay connected to the latest weather conditions with AccuWeather. Now supporting Android Wear™, this free app features the new AccuWeather MinuteCast®, the leading minute-by-minute precipitation forecast, hyper-localized to your exact street address. AccuWeather offers the same Superior Accuracy™ and great experience across all Android smartphones and tablets, and Android Wear.  	Weatherproof your day for free with these features: •	AccuWeather MinuteCast® – minute-by-minute precipitation forecasts for the next two hours hyper-localized to your exact street address or GPS location. Includes precipitation type and intensity, and start and end times for precipitation. Available for the contiguous United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Ireland, Japan, France, Germany, Belgium, Switzerland, Netherlands, Luxembourg, and a growing list of global locations. •	MinuteCast widget now available. Also available, homescreen widget displaying two-day forecasts with severe weather warnings for your GPS location and a time clock. Resizable, multi-location widgets also available with even more weather detail. •	For worldwide locations, when AccuWeather forecasts snow, ice, rain, wind, or the probability of thunderstorms, you’ll see an orange exclamation point displayed within the location’s current and 15-day screens.•	Push notifications for severe weather alerts in the United States. •	Radar for all of North America and Europe, and worldwide satellite overlaying interactive Google Maps™ with a snapshot view of the maps for your saved locations.   •	Current news and weather videos, with many available in both English and Spanish.•	Social media sharing so you can share your location’s current conditions, hourly, or 15-day forecasts using the social media apps you have on your device.   You also get the accurate, local weather forecasts and customization you expect from AccuWeather:•	Accurate and local forecasts for every latitude/longitude on Earth. Forecasts update every 15 minutes with information for the next 15 days – all in 33 languages and dialects.•	Current weather conditions update every 15 minutes with the very latest humidity and precipitation percentages, dew point, visibility, UV index, wind speed gusts and direction, times for sunrise and sunset, and RealFeel® – AccuWeather’s exclusive weather forecasting system that analyzes multiple weather factors to determine how the local temperature actually feels. •	Local weather forecast summaries that provide an overview of the next five days’ weather forecast along with a description of the most dramatic weather event expected during the five days.•	Status bar on the homescreen displaying the current temperature for your current or home location. •	Ability to store an unlimited amount of locations.  •	Choice between metric or imperial units, 12-hour or 24-hour time display, and portrait or landscape view.Please note: Sunrise and sunset times are found in Daily Details which can be viewed by tapping on daily forecast. Also, AccuWeather Holo Dark and Light widgets display RealFeel® and occupy only the 4x1 space. Download AccuWeather for free and experience the Superior Accuracy™ that comes from high-quality weather forecasting.
descriptionHTML:
Stay connected to the latest weather conditions with AccuWeather. Now supporting Android Wear™, this free app features the new AccuWeather MinuteCast®, the leading minute-by-minute precipitation forecast, hyper-localized to your exact street address. AccuWeather offers the same Superior Accuracy™ and great experience across all Android smartphones and tablets, and Android Wear.

Weatherproof your day for free with these features:

• AccuWeather MinuteCast® – minute-by-minute precipitation forecasts for the next two hours hyper-localized to your exact street address or GPS location. Includes precipitation type and intensity, and start and end times for precipitation. Available for the contiguous United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Ireland, Japan, France, Germany, Belgium, Switzerland, Netherlands, Luxembourg, and a growing list of global locations.
• MinuteCast widget now available. Also available, homescreen widget displaying two-day forecasts with severe weather warnings for your GPS location and a time clock. Resizable, multi-location widgets also available with even more weather detail.
• For worldwide locations, when AccuWeather forecasts snow, ice, rain, wind, or the probability of thunderstorms, you’ll see an orange exclamation point displayed within the location’s current and 15-day screens.
• Push notifications for severe weather alerts in the United States.
• Radar for all of North America and Europe, and worldwide satellite overlaying interactive Google Maps™ with a snapshot view of the maps for your saved locations.
• Current news and weather videos, with many available in both English and Spanish.
• Social media sharing so you can share your location’s current conditions, hourly, or 15-day forecasts using the social media apps you have on your device.

You also get the accurate, local weather forecasts and customization you expect from AccuWeather:
• Accurate and local forecasts for every latitude/longitude on Earth. Forecasts update every 15 minutes with information for the next 15 days – all in 33 languages and dialects.
• Current weather conditions update every 15 minutes with the very latest humidity and precipitation percentages, dew point, visibility, UV index, wind speed gusts and direction, times for sunrise and sunset, and RealFeel® – AccuWeather’s exclusive weather forecasting system that analyzes multiple weather factors to determine how the local temperature actually feels.
• Local weather forecast summaries that provide an overview of the next five days’ weather forecast along with a description of the most dramatic weather event expected during the five days.
• Status bar on the homescreen displaying the current temperature for your current or home location.
• Ability to store an unlimited amount of locations.
• Choice between metric or imperial units, 12-hour or 24-hour time display, and portrait or landscape view.

Please note: Sunrise and sunset times are found in Daily Details which can be viewed by tapping on daily forecast. Also, AccuWeather Holo Dark and Light widgets display RealFeel® and occupy only the 4x1 space.

Download AccuWeather for free and experience the Superior Accuracy™ that comes from high-quality weather forecasting.
whatsNew: 3.4.1.8Thank you for using AccuWeather.•	Design improvements for AccuWeather MinuteCast® – the only global minute-by-minute precipitation forecast for a person’s exact street address or GPS location.•	Bug fixes to enhance your overall AccuWeather app experience.*  Please re-add widgets if widgets disappear after update. We have added a new widget "AccuWeather Now" that supports MinuteCastAs always, contact support@accuweather.com with any questions or concerns. We are here to help.

topReviews.reviewText: Not even now is not optimized for the Sony Z Ultra. Windows does not fit the huge display of Sony. I got another widget on a Samsung phone, but I don't have it on Sony despite the fact that Sony has a upgraded Android. Hope you fix those things.
Keeps crashing on my moto g. Urgent fix required. I still love this app and don't want to uninstall. Thanks

Only thing i dont like is that there is no refresh button on the widget. Also the widget isnt so great looking and you cant make it translucent at all, wich is a big bummer to me. Works great, just doesnt look no were near as good as all the other weather app widgets.

This app is pretty accurate, but at times the weather can be very warm and sunny out and i get flash flood and severe thunderstorm warnings push notifications. It's still more accurate than the other weather apps though.
Yea I like this for a while but now I could get more accurate weather from looking outside. Fix or I'm sticking with The Weather Channel.
Love the app.if it would quit crashing. Tired of wasting data to re-download. One more time and I'm DONE with this app. Fix it and I'll raise my rating to 5.
Doesn't live up to it's name and the display system is worse than other widgets
Galaxy s4 active and the widget will not show up on any screen. Turned device off/on, re uploaded app, nothing. App is of no use without widgets.
Pretty accurate compared to others. But displays the wrong time to my current time in Melbourne, Australia.
Originally when I first downloaded this app it was great. Weather loaded fast and I was able to swipe screens quickly. Now after the last couple of updates it is agonizingly slow.
topReviews.reviewTitle: Not what it use to be!

topReviews.reviewText: I really really love this app as it informs a really accurate weather we are facing. It is just so unfortunate that the widget design isnt that good. :(
topReviews.reviewTitle: Accurate but nit the widget design

topReviews.reviewText: Works perfect

This app I love but lately when there is a weather statement and I click on more info a pic of Garfield comes up and I never can see what it says.  It is also starting to stay on the bottom of my screen.  I have uninstalled and reinstalled and it is still the same.  Please fix it!
Problems are fixed! All is well!
topReviews.reviewTitle: I used to love this app!

topReviews.reviewText: I love this app but lately it works for a few days then epically fails. Then I've got to uninstall and reinstall. Please fix whatever is causing this issue so I can rely on this app again. Thank you. I'll change rating at that point.
Love the app. Very informative. But needs a long range outlook as I want to see the whole weeks weather, not just the current conditions. Highs and lows for days coming would complete the app.
For the most part it's pretty accurate and I love how it gives you the temp in the upper left corner of my phone with easy access to the weather!! Love this app better n more accurate than most!!!
The current weather description can be wildly off, but this is the best hassle-free weather app. It does not  drain my battery unless I am constantly refreshing the radar map.
After the day light savings, the app stopped working. Pretty accurate while it was working tho.
love to check maps to see when storms are gonna hit my area only accurate app for my remote location
Love it because it gives me notifications of fog and other much needed info before I leave home. The only thing I would change would be to make it more user friendly to find the week's forecast.
I like this app better than others I have used and it is fine for places when I'm there, but doesn't allow me to look at obscure UK places when I' m at home. I nuisance when travelling somewhere
This thing gives you more info than any other app I've ever seen. I love it

Accurate. LOTS of information. Several good widget choices. An ad free version. This is my new weather app of choice. Now if they would put in a tab based interface instead of all swiping (faster to switch between screens) I'd give it 5 stars.
Use to be accurate but as of 2015 it is Never Accurate. Please fix it or I will have to Delete. Thanks
topReviews.reviewTitle: Says no rain but guess what;  It's Raining

topReviews.reviewText: Pain in the rear end. I hate this samsung s5 after the lollipop update anyway. But what's worse is that none of the apps function as they once did since February 3rd. My rating is based on this poo phone as I have nothing else to compare it to. Well done samsung and well done apps for allowing lollipop to ruin a possibly decent app pre February.  Never had anything to complain about it before.
It is a nice app. It is sometimes accurate but sometimes wrong. Overall mostly accurate.
topReviews.reviewTitle: Nice- sometimes accurate but sometimes wrong

topReviews.reviewText: Would give 5 stars but can't read temp without opening app bad when any kind of alert shows up and the color of red is hard to see on black
The detailed weather shown is quite accurate and i like it. But  it always show me popup titled "network connection problem" when my signal is very good. Please fix this for 5 stars, thanks.
I will give it 5 stars if it allows notifications in excess of 60 minuts. Eg: once a day or once a week
But won't even open on my G2 anymore. Location is always wrong on tablet, yet forecast and current conditions jive with other apps I use.  Hopefully gets fixed soon.
It has all you need to know about the weather. I only noticed one thing missing - pollen count, but it's still top notch to me and it's absolutely "free"..
What happened to this app? I have to uninstall and reinstall about twice a week now, because it just stops working???? It's ok when it's actually working.
I get a quicker informative map during pending storms during weather events.
Love it and don't give up on using it, but lately has been freezing and bugging a lot. Please fix it if it's on your end.

Wish it would automatically give me the weather as I travel. Wish I could update it to the minute when I want to. It may have these features, but I haven't found them. Otherwise this app has a lot of information on it.
Have been using this ap for a long time.  Like it a lot. Got a new Samsung phone a couple weeks ago and really like the display of this ap.
By far more accurate than the weather channel app. Don't get me wrong I like the set up better on TWC but I'd take more accurate any day!! Thanks for being so up to date and time lol
this is the most accurate 1 I have used in a long time. will continue to use it
The forecast and app in general is fine. It's the desktop icon that really sucks. My clock will be accurate at 8am and my desktop icon will read 3am. Then the next time I look and it will be 10am.
